item.title: ---Help with a command copiler errer---
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

castOn.plrText = "ALL HAIL "+playerName+"!";
castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true;

Those two lines are causing the problem. You either:

  1. Just remove it completely.
  2. Edit it to something that is compatible with your server.

Read full topic

item.title: ---Help with a command copiler errer---
item.dc:creator: @patsquare patsquare
item.description:
@patsquare wrote:

alright so i tried to add ::hail command i added this under a public void :

public void hail()
   {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players
        client person = (client)p;
if(p != null && person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= 5) {
client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client
castOn.plrText = "ALL HAIL "+playerName+"!";
castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true;
castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY);
castOn.setAnimation(1651);
castOn.updateRequired = true;
castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
       }
}
}

and this under one of my commands:

if(command.startsWith("hail") && playerRights > 2){
hail();
}

and im getting this compiling error:

client.java:494: cannot find symbol symbol : variable plrText location: class client castOn.plrText = "ALL HAIL "+playerName+"!"; ^ client.java:495: cannot find symbol symbol : variable plrTextUpdateRequired location: class client castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; ^ 2 errors You have sucsessfully compiled Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
